SEARCH
Package gw.test

Class TestClassUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.test.TestClassUtil
public final class TestClassUtil extends Object
This class exists to get public static methods out of the TestClass subclass hierarchy. GW-internal test base classes that want to make these methods available can re-declare them and delegate to this class for the implementation. For example, 

   public class InternalBaseTestClass extends TestClass {
     ...
     public static void assertZero(int i) {
       TestClassUtil.assertZero(i);
     }
     ...
   }

    • assertArrayEquals

      public static void assertArrayEquals(Object[] expected, Object[] got, TestClassUtil.EqualityTester tester)
      Verifies that all elements in the first array are present in the second array and match the elements in the first array. Uses EqualityUtil to determine equality and is order-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      expected - the expected result (reference)
      got - the obtained result (what to compare against the reference)

    • assertArrayEquals

      public static void assertArrayEquals(String message, byte[] expected, byte[] actual)
      Compare two byte arrays, first the size then each byte.

      actual -
